data.author: Asif Kapadia
data.quote: Hopefully, when people see 'Senna', they will understand why this inspirational story needed to be told, why it had to be made as a movie for the big screen, and why it is a film for everyone.

data.author: Mindy Kaling
data.quote: Almost every college playwright or sketch or improv comedian was sort of aware of Christopher Durang - even kids in high school. His short plays were so accessible to younger people and I think that was inspirational to me.

data.author: Viktor E. Frankl
data.quote: Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it.

data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
data.quote: If you wish to be a success in the world, promise everything, deliver nothing.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.

data.author: James Allen
data.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.

data.author: George A. Sheehan
data.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.

data.author: Michael Buble
data.quote: I have a tendency to sabotage relationships; I have a tendency to sabotage everything. Fear of success, fear of failure, fear of being afraid. Useless, good-for-nothing thoughts.

data.author: Conor McGregor
data.quote: I'm not going to get somewhere and say, 'OK, I'm done.' Success is never final; I'll just keep on going. The same way as failure never being fatal. Just keep going. I'm going to the stars and then past them.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

data.author: Marvin Sapp
data.quote: Marvin's Motivational Moments actually started as something that was actually therapeutic for me. I would sit up late at night after my wife passed trying to adjust to being alone.

data.author: Simone de Beauvoir
data.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

data.author: Leonard Mlodinow
data.quote: Our subliminal mental processes operate outside awareness because they arise in these portions of our mind that are inaccessible to our conscious self; their inaccessibility is due to the architecture of the brain rather than because they have been subject to Freudian motivational forces like repression.

data.author: Nigel Lythgoe
data.quote: Since we launched the original 'Pop Idol' in England, I've remained close with Simon Fuller. Working as executive producer on 'American idol' for its first seven years not only was an inspirational journey into the heart of American pop culture, it opened my eyes to the untapped potential of the incredibly dynamic young people in this world.

data.author: Barbara Walters
data.quote: Success can make you go one of two ways. It can make you a prima donna - or it can smooth the edges, take away the insecurities, let the nice things come out.

data.author: Jamie Dimon
data.quote: We don't have a divine right to success. So I agree with a lot of politicians out there when they say, 'We've got serious issues.' We do: immigration, infrastructure. I think income inequality's one of them.

data.author: Philip Zimbardo
data.quote: Academic success depends on research and publications.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: Well, I think that there's a very thin dividing line between success and failure. And I think if you start a business without financial backing, you're likely to go the wrong side of that dividing line.
